title: Wright Brothers National Memorial: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring the Wright brothers to your students. Review our lesson plans and curricula. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    First Controlled Powered Flight Learn More     Field Trips Visiting the national memorial is a great way to bring your lessons to life! Learn more about the hands-on, interactive ranger programs available for your class and get planning information for your trip. All Field Trips   Ranger led program    Flight Room Talk Learn More
